Package controllers

Interface InterfaceController

All Known Implementing Classes:
AbstractController, DrawController, ExampleController, ExitController, MainController, QuickController
public interface InterfaceController
The interface Interface controller.

  • Field Summary

    Fields 
    Modifier and Type Field Description
    static FileHandler fh
    A FileHandler that allows ability to save and load new files.
    static java.util.HashMap<java.lang.String,​java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String>> sceneDataMap
    The Scene data map.
    static SceneData sd
    T generify type Class data holder Object to move data between Controllers.
    static SceneSwitcher wm
    SceneSwitcher Object allowing transition to a new Scene.

  • Field Details

    • wm

      static final SceneSwitcher wm
      SceneSwitcher Object allowing transition to a new Scene.

    • fh

      static final FileHandler fh
      A FileHandler that allows ability to save and load new files.

    • sd

      static final SceneData sd
      T generify type Class data holder Object to move data between Controllers.

    • sceneDataMap

      static final java.util.HashMap<java.lang.String,​java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String>> sceneDataMap
      The Scene data map.

  • Method Details

    • initialize

      void initialize()
      Initialize. Implements the function, but abstracts the functionality. Must include the use of Platform.runLater(). This is needed to hold the data 'that is alive' within the running Thread and transfer it into memory, into a new object within the next running Thread so that the data can be accessed by the requested Scene.

    • runLater

      void runLater()
      Run later. Utilises the ability to hold off the garbage collector with late code execution on a sleeper Thread.

    • init_data

      void init_data​(SceneData sd)
      Init data. The function that is used to unpack transferred generfied type T data from scene to scene into a specified HashMap.
      Parameters:
      sd - the sd

    • move_window

      void move_window​(javafx.event.ActionEvent actionEvent) throws java.io.IOException
      Move window. EventHandler implemented and abstracted out is now accessible to all JavaFX Objects allowing, multiple Scenes to be loaded and handled using a standard function.
      Parameters:
      actionEvent - the action event
      Throws:
      java.io.IOException - the io exception
